Posts.Content: May 26, 2012 11:42AM HCLBR wrote: I am in Idaho and just diagnosed this week. I am not afraid of dying, but I AM TERRIFIED of chemo and losing my hair and being disfigured from surgery. Not sure any treatment is an option for me personally!  I read about all of these people willing to do whatever and I am just am not "there".  I am not sure I ever can be.
Posts.Title: just diagnosed Cadillac Melrosemelrose
